```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(geonames)
library(countrycode)
library(here)
library(kableExtra)

key <- getOption("geonamesUsername") # Call geonames username to access data
theme_set(new = theme_minimal())
```

```{r import & merge data, message = FALSE}
# Import data 
gapminder_df <- gapminder::gapminder
geonames_df <- GNcountryInfo()

# Create key to join
gadminder_key <- gapminder_df %>%
  mutate(
    country = countrycode(
      country, 
      origin = "country.name", 
      destination = "iso2c"
    )
  )



```
